content: Experience stunning scenery, distinctive hospitality and unique experiences in the land of a thousand hills.
translated_text: Ubunararibonye butangaje ahantu nyaburanga kwakira abashyitsi hamwe nubunararibonye budasanzwe mugihugu cyimisozi igihumbi

content: 30-day Free Visa upon arrival for African Union, Commonwealth & La Francophonie citizens.
translated_text: Viza yubusa 30 kumunsi ugeze kubaturage ba Afrika yubumwe bwa Commonwealth La Francophonie

content: The 2nd easiest place to do business in Africa (World Bank 2020)
translated_text: Umwanya wa 2 woroshye gukora ubucuruzi muri Afrika Bank World 2020

content: Known as the land of a thousand hills, Rwanda’s stunning scenery and warm, friendly people offer unique experiences in one of the most remarkable countries in the world.
translated_text: Azwi nk'ubutaka bw'imisozi igihumbi ibyiza by'u Rwanda hamwe n'abantu b'inshuti bishyushye bitanga uburambe budasanzwe muri kimwe mu bihugu bitangaje ku isi

content: Find information about all government services including legal and travel documents, business, career opportunities and more.
translated_text: Shakisha amakuru ajyanye na serivisi zose za leta zirimo amategeko ningendo ibyangombwa byubucuruzi amahirwe yubucuruzi nibindi byinshi

content: You can request different Government services online through Irembo, the one-stop service portal.
translated_text: Urashobora gusaba serivisi za leta zitandukanye kumurongo ukoresheje Irembo kumurongo wa serivise ya onestop

content: Enjoy Rwanda's business friendly environment. It takes only 6 hours to register a business online.
translated_text: Ishimire Rwandas ibidukikije byubucuruzi Bifata amasaha 6 gusa kugirango wandike ubucuruzi kumurongo

content: The filing and payment of income tax in different categories is done online.
translated_text: Gutanga no kwishyura umusoro ku byiciro bitandukanye bikorwa kumurongo

content: Are you a supplier of goods, works, services or non-consultancy services? The E-Procurement System “Umucyo” links you to all public tenders.
translated_text: Waba utanga ibicuruzwa serivisi zikora cyangwa serivisi zidahwitse Sisitemu ya EProcurement Sisitemu “Umucyo” iguhuza namasoko rusange.
